text: The Truth About Women is a 1957 British comedy movie directed by Muriel Box and starring Laurence Harvey, Julie Harris, Diane Cilento, Mai Zetterling, Eva Gabor, Derek Farr, Michael Denison, Roland Culver, Robert Rietti. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Muriel Box
title: The Truth About Women
